title: Anathema
description: Love Is UnwaveringElizabeth and Lev believe the danger with the dark angels and the Dagger of Light are finally behind them, but with Elizabethâ€™s sacrifice comes a new more menacing threat as whatever power the dagger once possessed now possesses Elizabeth, endangering all those she loves most. In a last ditch effort to protect them, Elizabeth runs away, unaware her fate rests with a Triune of angels who have come to judge her transgressions against others of their kind.Sojourner Book 4
author: Maria Rachel Hooley
